state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. next_state: -= Kitchen =- You've entered a kitchen. You can make out an opened fridge. The fridge contains a green bell pepper, a white onion, a block of cheese, a red bell pepper and a parsley. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal an oven. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. You can see a table. On the table you can see a knife. Oh, great. Here's a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you can see a fried red apple, a roasted yellow potato, a raw red potato, a red onion, a green apple, a yellow onion, a raw purple potato, a banana and a cookbook. You can make out a stove. Now why would someone leave that there? The stove is conventional. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! There is an open frosted-glass door leading east. There is an exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. > -= Kitchen =-0/6
